description: Describes the specified collection. You can use DescribeCollection to get information, such as the number of faces indexed into a collection and the version of the model used by the collection for face detection. For more information, see Describing a Collection in the Amazon Rekognition Developer Guide.

parameters.name: CollectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the collection to describe.

nested_items.name: FaceCount
nested_items.description: The number of faces that are indexed into the collection. To index faces into a collection, use  IndexFaces.

nested_items.name: FaceModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the face model that's used by the collection for face detection.

nested_items.name: CollectionARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collection.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds since the Unix epoch time until the creation of the collection. The Unix epoch time is 00:00:00 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), Thursday, 1 January 1970.

nested_items.name: UserCount
nested_items.description: The number of UserIDs assigned to the specified colleciton.
